original_title: 羞恥 新入生発育健康診断　令和元年（2019）～初夏～
overview: Spring day before Golden Week. I was told that there was a medical examination of the prefecture and I was put on the bus.  Only specially selected students can participate in this measurement.  It seems that if you take it to the end properly, the score on the report card will improve.  I was told that recommended admission and AO admission would be advantageous, so I was glad that I was selected.  But something is strange. Normally, when it comes to physical measurements and medical examinations, it should be gender-specific ...  At today's venue, the boys I always meet at school were also gathered.  What will happen today ... I'm worried and can't help it.
title: Shame, Medical Of New Student’s Development 2019 -First Summer-
